creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: two stylized women standing near a column or street lamp; woman at L is in mid-stride holding a clutch purse at PR hand; woman at R facing woman at L with PR hand adjusting hair

Signature, Inscription, Watermark

-- in graphit signed and inscribed in graphite, below platemark:
provenance: Given by artist to D.J. Simons; [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until November 11, 1986; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Two Girls
